sense.name: lower and raise (as if) with the head
sense.examples: The wizard's eyes flicked up at the commander, and he nodded his understanding. 'Yeah, that,' Uther nodded at the dead cow, his face serious. Michelle nodded her head, laughing, 'I'm still going to do that.' The green moss lay in tufts upon the roof, the grass nodded from the eaves.

sense.name: lower the head as if falling asleep
sense.examples: Earnhardt nodded off at the wheel while waiting for the race to start. The old seer sat nodding at the fireplace.
